params.tag_line: A Blog loved by the Hackers
params.about_text: Hii, I am Rahul Sangwan an ethical hacker. I am an information security expert who systematically attempts to penetrate a computer system, network, application or other computing resource on behalf of its owners -- and with their permission -- to find security vulnerabilities that a malicious hacker could attack over and get the confidential data for wrong doing. I also teach the students to be an ethical hacker.If you want to learn ethical hacking you can contact me through contact provided at the same website you are at. I will definitely reply you.
